positive_examples: This is an example of war museum.
The war museum demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed war museum in this context.
A typical case of war museum would involve these features.
The concept of war museum applies here.
A museum dedicated to preserving military history, displaying weapons, uniforms, and exhibits about armed conflicts and warfare.
negative_examples: This is an example of art museum, not war museum.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: ArtMuseum, or other types of Museum

definition: An institution dedicated to preserving and displaying military history and artifacts.
